dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think conservation is just about protecting what's already there, but actually, it's about actively restoring lost ecosystems.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think conservation is just about protecting what's already there, but actually, it's about actively restoring lost ecosystems.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and this Przewalski's horse project in Kazakhstan is a perfect example. They just got eight new horses from Prague Zoo and Hungary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and this Przewalski's horse project in Kazakhstan is a perfect example. They just got eight new horses from Prague Zoo and Hungary.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new group of Przewalski's horses has arrived in Kazakhstan as part of the international Return of Wild Horses project, citing the Committee of Forestry and Wildlife at the Ministry of Ecology. Eight horses " four from Prague Zoo and four from Hungary's Hortobagy National Park " were transported aboard two military planes that departed on June 2 from the Czech Republic and Hungary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, four from each place. And they were flown on military planes, which is uh, pretty intense logistics for horses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, four from each place. And they were flown on military planes, which is uh, pretty intense logistics for horses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Eight horses " four from Prague Zoo and four from Hungary's Hortobagy National Park " were transported aboard two military planes that departed on June 2 from the Czech Republic and Hungary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: A nearly 24-hour journey to Arkalyk airport, then a five-hour drive to the Altyn Dala reserve. That's a long trip for those animals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A nearly twenty four-hour journey to Arkalyk airport, then a five-hour drive to the Altyn Dala reserve. That's a long trip for those animals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The animals arrived early on June 3 at the airport in Arkalyk after a nearly 24-hour journey, followed by a five-hour drive to the hoofed animal reintroduction center at the Altyn Dala state nature reserve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it's worth it—they'll spend about a year in enclosures before being released into the wild. It's all part of building a genetically diverse population.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's worth it-they'll spend about a year in enclosures before being released into the wild. It's all part of building a genetically diverse population.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There, the horses will spend about a year in spacious enclosures before being released into the wild. These animals from European zoos will become the foundation for a wild, genetically diverse population.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And this is the second group already. The first group of seven horses arrived back in June 2024, and they're apparently done adapting and ready for release.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this is the second group already. The first group of seven horses arrived back in June twenty twenty four, and they're apparently done adapting and ready for release.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are pleased to see that the second group has arrived successfully and the first group has completed the adaptation period and is ready to be released into the wild under the protection of our inspectors, said Daniyar Turgambayev, Deputy Chairman of the Committee of Forestry and Wildlife. The first group of seven horses was brought to Kazakhstan in June 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Daniyar Turgambayev from the Committee of Forestry and Wildlife mentioned that—saying it's an honor to restore their natural heritage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Daniyar Turgambayev from the Committee of Forestry and Wildlife mentioned that-saying it's an honor to restore their natural heritage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the lead agency for biodiversity conservation in Kazakhstan, it is a great honor to oversee such an important step in restoring our natural heritage. We are pleased to see that the second group has arrived successfully and the first group has completed the adaptation period and is ready to be released into the wild under the protection of our inspectors, said Daniyar Turgambayev, Deputy Chairman of the Committee of Forestry and Wildlife.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Miroslav Bobek from Prague Zoo pointed out they're working with the Czech Army again to coordinate these transports. It's a huge international effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Miroslav Bobek from Prague Zoo pointed out they're working with the Czech Army again to coordinate these transports. It's a huge international effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Miroslav Bobek, director of Prague Zoo, added that this is the second time the zoo has coordinated a transport of Przewalski's horses to Kazakhstan in cooperation with the Czech Army.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: By 2029, they want to bring over 40 to 45 horses total to create a sustainable wild population in the Altyn Dala reserve.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: By twenty twenty nine, they want to bring over forty to forty five horses total to create a sustainable wild population in the Altyn Dala reserve.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities plan to relocate around 40 to 45 horses by 2029 " enough to form a sustainable wild population. The Altyn Dala state nature reserve in the Kostanay region has been designated as the release site.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is in the Kostanay region, right? And it's not just horses—Kazakhstan's also bringing in Turan tigers from Russia next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is in the Kostanay region, right? And it's not just horses-Kazakhstan's also bringing in Turan tigers from Russia next year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Altyn Dala state nature reserve in the Kostanay region has been designated as the release site. In March 2025, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources, Yerlan Nyssanbayev, announced that Kazakhstan planned to bring four more Turan tigers from Russia to restore the animal's population.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, four tigers in March 2025, according to the Minister of Ecology. They're really going all-in on reintroduction programs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, four tigers in March twenty twenty five, according to the Minister of Ecology. They're really going all-in on reintroduction programs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March 2025, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources, Yerlan Nyssanbayev, announced that Kazakhstan planned to bring four more Turan tigers from Russia to restore the animal's population.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's ambitious, but you know, if it works, it could reverse decades of biodiversity loss.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's ambitious, but you know, if it works, it could reverse decades of biodiversity loss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. These projects show that extinction isn't always forever—if we put in the effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. These projects show that extinction isn't always forever-if we put in the effort.
